alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:21PM CDT until June 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...SOUTHEASTERN VAN BUREN...CONWAY... NORTHWESTERN FAULKNER AND SOUTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Vincent, or 7 miles north of Morrilton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Greenbrier... Atkins... Wooster... Oppelo... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Perry... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Pickles Gap... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Lanty... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren
